thread.title: Rob Gronkowski crashed LeGarrette Blount's dance party
thread.title_full: Rob Gronkowski crashed LeGarrette Blount's dance party

title: Rob Gronkowski crashed LeGarrette Blount's dance party
text:
Though he was injured for the Super Bowl, Rob Gronkowski was still very much a part of the Patriots’ championship season. And he wasn’t going to miss the victory parade through Boston on Tuesday.
On the same Duck Boat with LeGarrette Blount, Gronkowski joined in with his teammates in a dance party:
Gronk isn’t too injured to dance. (Even if LaGarrette Blount is better.) pic.twitter.com/AlSTeOws5M
— SI Extra Mustard (@SI_ExtraMustard) February 7, 2017
. @LG_Blount @SweetFeet_White @DionLewisRB @MartysaurusRex @RobGronkowski dancing through Copley #WBZ #Patriots #SuperBowl @cbsboston pic.twitter.com/dvzNAS7Ucx
— Joe Giza (@JoeGiza) February 7, 2017
